books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: While he investigates the murder of two pharmacists, an old case comes back to haunt Harry Bosch.
books.name: TWO KINDS OF TRUTH

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: Three students at a sleazy for-profit law school hope to expose the student-loan banker who runs it.
books.name: THE ROOSTER BAR

books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: A symbology professor goes on a perilous quest with a beautiful museum director.
books.name: ORIGIN

books.author: by Margaret Atwood
books.description: Men and women in a dystopian future. The basis of the Hulu series; originally published in 1985.
books.name: THE HANDMAID'S TALE

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: A new collection of poetry from the author of "Milk and Honey."
books.name: THE SUN AND HER FLOWERS

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Virgil Flowers is called to investigate in Trippton, Minn., when a local bank's president is found dead in a nearly frozen river.
books.name: DEEP FREEZE

books.author: by Eloisa James
books.description: Lord Alaric Wilde retreats from public attention to his father's castle and encounters Miss Willa Ffynche.
books.name: WILDE IN LOVE

books.author: by Mark Frost
books.description: Updated profiles on the residents of Twin Peaks are assembled by special agent Tamara Preston.
books.name: TWIN PEAKS: THE FINAL DOSSIER

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: The fears of seven teenagers are rekindled in their adult lives by the terrifying title character. Originally published in 1986.
books.name: IT

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: Poetic approaches to surviving adversity and loss.
books.name: MILK AND HONEY

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: Joshua takes over the crime syndicate back home in Louisiana, but can he resist Sonia?
books.name: LEOPARD'S BLOOD

books.author: by Lisa Wingate
books.description: A South Carolina lawyer learns about the questionable practices of a Tennessee orphanage.
books.name: BEFORE WE WERE YOURS

books.author: by Ken Follett
books.description: A pair of lovers find themselves on opposite sides of a conflict while Queen Elizabeth fights to maintain her throne.
books.name: A COLUMN OF FIRE

books.author: by Diana Palmer
books.description: In the freezing mountain west, a band of criminals track a security expert and the woman who wrecked his life.
books.name: WYOMING WINTER

books.author: by Tom Hanks
books.description: Seventeen short stories, each incorporating a typewriter, by the Academy Award-winning actor.
books.name: UNCOMMON TYPE
